name: Sea-Plane: Flight Simulator 3D
description: Sea Plane: Flight Simulator 3D is an awesome new 3D Simulation game, pilot a Sea Plane and start delivering passengers at their destinations; guide the plane across the sea to the pick-up point, pick up all of the passengers, fly to the destination then drop the tourists off where they need to go. Show off your abilities by swooping between obstacles and flying between volcanoes!
